message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, considering I'm taking the risk of starting the negotiations.
Your starting offer was a bit aggressive, Alice.  Let's be more realistic. I propose 60/40 in my favor.  Time is money, and we both lose value with each passing round.
Okay, let's compromise. I'm willing to lower my share to 55% if you agree to a 45% split.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's find a solution before it's too late.
Alice, this back-and-forth is pointless.  We're both losing out due to inflation. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly before we both get burned.
